snippet: A collection of papers from Marvin Miller, who led the baseball players union from 1966 to ’83, chronicles his leadership path.
abstract: Collection of papers from Marvin Miller, who led the baseball players union from 1966 to ’83, chronicles his leadership path; offers private glimpses at serious, purposeful trade unionist who led the union into the era of free agency and who demanded that he, and the players, be taken seriously by baseball’s leaders.
lead_paragraph: A collection of papers from Marvin Miller, who led the baseball players union from 1966 to ’83, chronicles his leadership path.

headline.seo: Papers on Marvin Miller Reveal His Desire To Be Taken Seriously
headline.main: Letters Show Miller’s Desire to Be Taken Seriously
headline.print_headline: Letters Show Miller’s Push To Be Taken Seriously
